Welcome to CtrlReturn

Join our meetup CtrlReturn >> Jam & Learn at c-base
where art, technology, and innovation travels through
time and space!

Learning-by-doing

Ctrlreturn.de – where Art meets Coding! During our monthly "CtrlReturn >> Jam&Learn" at c-base, we'll dive into real-time music and video creation using code and explore different platforms/tools for performances.

Live-Coding Audio

Using Software e.g. FoxDot/Renardo, Tidal Cycles, SonicPi, or SuperCollider to compose music

Live-Coding Visuals

Create interactive video loops and visual compositions with software e.g. Hydra

Together in real-time

Collaborative jamming IRL or online using Troop or Flok

Networking

As Newbie or Expert, this is a good opportunity to share your passion with others

Become Hitchhiker with skills and towel!

We are looking for Live-Coding Artists and Tutors

for our jam meetups and future events

Get Involved!

The Place

According to the club members' “findings,” the space station c-base once got into a time hole and crashed to Earth from a distant future due to the suddenly changed conditions. There were a number of highly technical developments and life forms that had not yet been researched on board.

  • 4500000000

    Age of Space station

  • 1995

    Year of Discovery

clamp. The c-base cosmos The framework around everything - overview of activities and possibilities and the construction of the space station.

carbon. The crew The inputs of carbon-based life forms crew and research teams in the logbook. It contains the previously known station history and the reconstruction process.

cience. science and education Seminars and workshops from C like c-base about C programming, Internet use, Linux, web design to Z for future research.

creactiv. Projects The focus for creativity and imagination. The crew pools theirs artistic and technical visions through actions and projects.

culture. The events sector The conception and implementation of exhibitions, sporting events, activities, performance & theater, readings, parties and much more

communication. Discussion and presentation platform Communication between all levels and areas of c-base creates new ideas. Communication on foreign missions opened. Contact options of all kinds, both for expanding the crew as well as the establishment of international contacts.

core. The core The organization as a non-profit association (c-base e.V.) is the sponsor the work areas described.
